name: xformers
summary: XFormers: A collection of composable Transformer building blocks.

chunks.text: XFormers: A collection of composable Transformer building blocks.XFormers aims at being able to reproduce most architectures in the Transformer-family SOTA,defined as compatible and combined building blocks as opposed to monolithic models

usage_description: This library is used to compose various building blocks for creating different architectures within the Transformer family, enabling developers to easily combine or modify these components. With xformers, developers can quickly reproduce state-of-the-art (SOTA) models in the Transformer family by selecting and combining compatible building blocks.
